topic.title: What if i exceed the 50k?
topic.body: Everytime i post something on the board, i got nearer to the 50k. What if i reach the 50k? Do i need to use a new identity on the board?

1538407463_14ytAKDfNjArMTqGecTi7ginG3aZT.body:
> [kai0](#comment_695_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): resilio 

Ye that works. I normally connected to 400-800 peers with my ipfs client

> [kai0](#comment_695_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): resilio 

Ye that works. I normally connected to 400-800 peers with my ipfs client
